storyInfo: Rhodes Island retreats with Feist's help. Siege acquires the Sighs of Kings, but finds herself face-to-face with Allerdale.

attributes.content: Doctor! We have to take Amiya and go!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Shining can't hold Theresis off for long!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The drone—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Grab the zipline, Doctor! We'll go as far as we can!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: *huff*... *huff*... *cough* *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'll punch them, if worse comes to worst.
attributes.name: Closure
Closure
attributes.content: I don't like fighting, if I can help it.

attributes.name: Closure
attributes.content: But Theresa pulled me out of that attic. Amiya and Kal'tsit taught me responsibility.
I'm a Vampire too.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If it's for you, I...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure! Over here!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Time to move, Doctor. The zipline's ready. Give me your hand!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: A burst of light explodes as the sword pierces the ground.
Time stops in an instant.
...Confessarius witchcraft.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: General!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Dame Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: She approaches the end of this cycle.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's Cautus was rescued. The Sanguinarch of Vampires is pursuing the Banshee and Ascalon.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What of Theresa?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I just received Her Highness's signal, general.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It's ready.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The Regent looks up at the overcast sky and the walls in the distance.
The true battlefield of the Sarkaz lies beyond the walls.
It's time to begin.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Are you ready?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: There's nothing to make ready.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Right, we're finally here.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Vina, I must—
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We must bear witness to all this.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: An elaborate black structure lies at the end of the tunnel.
Generation after generation, the greatest minds in Victoria came together to build it.
All this, just to hold a sword.
If few are the heroes who can use it to conquer Catastrophe, then let humanity use its wisdom to raise a shield against the storm.
These structures, the entire building, was made for this.
The voices rise up again.
The calls are no longer urgent, no longer sharp, no longer attempting to persuade or incite.
She feels a tired sense of peace.
She has been here before. She has been guided to this place, long before her memories took shape.
Just like then, she knows where she must go, what she must take.
It is right there, in the middle of the room, unguarded, so unremarkable it might as well have been a tiny decoration in this grand building.
Kyngasycath, the Sighs of Kings.
It lay there and continues to do so, over the centuries, through countless reforgings.
Siege extends a hand towards it.
Broken shadows fill the space, rising and ebbing, resonating.
Alexandrina. Alexandrina Vina Victoria. They whisper her name.
She touches the sword.
Shards of days gone by pass through her body. She hears a boom in her mind.
Suddenly, she understands.
She is the source of all those visions and sounds.
They are her doubts, confusion, regrets, recollections.
Things she has forgotten, and things she intentionally forgot.
A great hand raises her. Londinium stands up from beneath her, taking her across the land of Victoria.
The land that she and her friends walked.
Countless voices superimpose upon one another.
Victoria, Victoria.
This is Victoria.
Her Victoria.
The voices call out.
Siege opens her eyes. There are no illusions now, no tides. She holds in her hand the Sighs of Kings, symbol of the Victorian monarchy.
There is little to show that it is a sword of legend. It is unremarkable in size and design.
It looks like an ordinary sword.
You have the Sighs of Kings, Vina.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It's... lighter than I expected.
attributes.name: Siege
Siege
attributes.content: Let's go. Time to go home.

attributes.name: Siege
attributes.content: We—
attributes.joined: I don't like fighting, if I can help it.But Theresa pulled me out of that attic. Amiya and Kal'tsit taught me responsibility. Let's go. Time to go home. We—

attributes.content: Siege wants to turn around and feel the sword's warmth with her friends.
Don't.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But she feels a colder blade in her back.
...Allerdale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Please! Don't. Don't turn around.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Give me the sword.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Your Highness Alexandrina... I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I have to...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I have to do this.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Allerdale's voice is calm, but filled with a terrible, resolute sorrow.
Siege recalls the 'memoirs' that Morgan wrote in jest.
A handful of pages, clumsily written, with less-than-elegant vocabulary.
The story starts with a fictional fight. Everyone returns to base after the fight. Allerdale makes a cream stew for them in the story.
She laughs in her heart. Allerdale made a stew, yes, but what the memoirs omitted is that...
It did not exactly taste great.
Siege!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Oh—!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: You... you too...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I don't want to hurt you.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: But I have a debt to pay.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Our mission is to help Allerdale remove the sword from the Mausoleum of Kings.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Finish this job, and I can retire.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: It was an offer I couldn't refuse.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: We just mourned the heroes who fell victim to betrayal together.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I thought you would understand.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: But in the end, you're no different from them.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I'm ashamed I thought about trusting you, even for a moment.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Like I said, living is hard.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I'm sorry. I want all of us to keep on living. I'll try to make sure we do just that.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: We've both been pushed out of death's way by our friends.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Unfortunately, our paths happen to diverge this time.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Allerdale...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your Highness.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Please hand over the Sighs of Kings, for your own safety.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Is this the only way?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I betrayed your trust. There's nothing I can say about that.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You can admonish me, reproach me, try to defeat me. You have the right to do so.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But I will leave with the sword.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: This is my... destiny... in Londinium.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You said the Sighs of Kings would protect Londinium from the storm.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I don't want to drag Londinium into the abyss either. I won't let her fall into Sarkaz hands.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Into the hands of the dukes, then.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Whoever is behind you wants to use the Sighs of Kings to intimidate the other dukes and subjugate them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: They don't care about protecting Victoria.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We may be meek, but we're in the middle of all this.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: With the people who have been hurt and abused.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I know what she's after, but it doesn't concern me.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I'm only doing... I only care about what I can actually influence.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: What about the Self-Salvation Corps?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You built it with Clovisia. You protected it with your honor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I have no honor.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Then you protected it with your life.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What do I tell the Corps fighters, if you're really going to leave?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Clovisia will handle it.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I no longer have the strength to care about what they think of me.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You claim you only care about what you can influence.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Aren't you underestimating what you already have?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What does one dare to have, when you know it's only a matter of time before you lose it?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: What does one dare to reveal, when what everyone trusts and respects is just an illusion?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: What can one hold on to, when you realize this is the one and only end of your path?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: This isn't even the outcome of a choice.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I simply ended up here. Fate has pushed me to this place, before I even realized it.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We could never have walked together.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We met when we were little, didn't we?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: At Cumberland Manor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I thought you had forgotten.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I almost had... I was with Gawain that day.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The creature that was like the sun told us we would meet again, someday.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But he could not have guessed that it would end this way.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You won't give me the sword, Vina.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Then swing it. We must bear witness...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Allerdale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Remember my promise?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Enough! Say no more.
attributes.name: Allerdale
Allerdale
attributes.content: I carry nothing on my shoulders. I'll just be your brain trust.

attributes.name: Allerdale
attributes.content: Sorry... I forgot you had Morgan.

attributes.name: Allerdale
attributes.content: I'll just be a thug then.
attributes.joined: I carry nothing on my shoulders. I'll just be your brain trust.Sorry... I forgot you had Morgan.I'll just be a thug then.

attributes.content: We'll bomb the Sarkaz camp together. You light a fire, and I'll kick their commander's arse once there's smoke.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I'm joking.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: My path is long determined, Vina.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Why do you say that? You're still with us. The Glasgow Gang has more stories to write.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The answer is yes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'll make sure you come back unharmed after kicking that commander's arse.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That's my promise.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's not a joke. Never has been, never will be.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We'll all make it out of this in one piece.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: A sound breaks the stalemate.
Was it an illusion?
Siege looks around. The massive statues remain still in the shadows. None of the dead Sarkaz come back to life.
Again.
Nearby, right in front of her.
The sound of steam gushing, increasingly rapid.
Increasingly loud, increasingly clear, until it fills the entire space.
W-What's that?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Allerdale's heart skips a beat.
She can feel it.
The premonition of fate echoes again cruelly.
